brooklyn.entity.basic
[Java] Interface SameServerEntity

brooklyn.entity.Entity
  brooklyn.entity.trait.Identifiable
      brooklyn.entity.basic.SameServerEntity
          brooklyn.entity.trait.Startable
All Superinterfaces:
Entity, Identifiable, Startable
@ImplementedBy(SameServerEntityImpl.class)
public interface SameServerEntity
extends Entity, Startable

An entity that, on start(MachineProvisioningLocation), will obtain a machine and pass that to each of its children by calling their Startable.start methods with that machine. Thus multiple entities can be set up to run on the same machine.

Authors:
aled
